item.title: Maybe you're too connected?
item.description:
Maybe you're too connected?

I'm as addicted to my phone as the next guy. I don't like that fact about myself, but I also recognize it and try not to get too preachy about shit like "disconnecting" or whatever. We have miraculous tiny computers in our pocket. That's pretty incredible. We might as well use them. Sometimes, though, I'm confronted with the grim reality that not everyone is equipped to deal with this horrific power.

item.title: Ketamine Helps Depression
item.description:
Ketamine Helps Depression

According to a new study, anyway. Which is exactly what I've been telling people ever since that golden horse whispered it to me at that party 14 years ago. You needed SCIENCE for that shit?

item.title: CAGEMATCH!
item.description:
CAGEMATCH!

I had such a blast putting on this show. My pal Cory Guebels spent January coaching up two brand new improv teams. Then we pitted them against each other in a Battle Royale where the audience voted for their favorite.Â Let the record show our first ever Cagematch champion is Tangletown. They get to defend their title next month.

item.title: My favorite poster ever.
item.description:
My favorite poster ever.

Drawn by the amazing Sina Grace and illustrated by Shaun Struble. For the Goodbye Taylor show Princess put on. It pays to have super talented friends.
